title: The 'Evil' Behind Big Tech
itunes:title: The 'Evil' Behind Big Tech
description:
Vinny Catalano, Chief Market Strategist at Stuyvesant Capital Management, and CNN Global Economic Analyst Rana Foroohar discuss Rana's book "Don’t Be Evil: How Big Tech Betrayed Its Founding Principles--and All of Us." They break down digital surveillance, monetizing of data and whether it is time to redefine what constitutes a monopoly.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
